TopicTitle: SY-06 Hefaistos - a ship that builds ships.

Articles.Content: MODS: KSPIE, KJR, Space Y, B9+legacy packs, SVE, scatterer, navhud, kerbal engineer, procedural parts, procedural wing, nebula decals, kerbal foundries continued, simple construction, TAC fuel ballancer, TAC life support, hangar extender, distant object enhancer, DiRT (for changing the skybox get it!)
Is there a download file for this I really want to fly one not build a relplica
